item.description:
Wednesday, April 9, 2008

Medford

Talk by Noam Chomsky

Noam Chomsky fs Talk: Youth and Securing a Nuclear Free Future Thinking Outside the Bomb. Booksigning to follow.

Sponsored by Peace & Justice Studies, Tufts University, Think Outside the Bomb 2008 Youth & Student Conference, Mass Peace Action, Nuckear Age Peace Foundation, and AFSC-NH & NERO.

6-8PM
Cabot Intercultural Auditorium at 170 Packard Ave.

For more information please contact Erin Placey eplacey@afsc.org or 603-224-2407.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Noam Chomsky fs Talk: Youth and Securing a Nuclear Free Future Thinking Outside
